creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: steeply curving green bridge; six Asian children dressed in yellow and black play on bridge; branches thick with purple blossoms hang down from top edge
inscription:
Signature, date and inscription

signed: LRC, in pencil: [Helen Hyde]; LLC, in the plate: [HH (intertwined)/ (clover inside a circle)/ copyright. 1914.  by Helen Hyde]
title: Moon Bridge at Kameido
